---
title: "Lesson 4: Introduction to R object types"
---

Previously, we created an object in R that was a collection or ssequence of numbers.

```{r}
x1 <- 1:10
x2 <- c(3, 5, 11)
```

These can also be created for character variables:

```{r}
x3 <- "apple"
x4 <- c("orange", "banana")
```
